name: Number Guess
description:
Number Guess is a secret number guessing game. The computer will pick a random number between 1 and 100 and let the player guess at the number. As the player guesses, the computer will give hints if the guessed number is higher or lower than the secret number. The game is over when the secret number is correctly guessed by the player.

Controls

Mouse click: Interact with in-game computer and enter guesses.

Mouse click drag: Rotate camera.

Mouse wheel: Zoom in and out.

Number Keys: Enter numbers.

Backspace: Clear entry.

Return: Enter number.

k: Cycle sfx volume.

m: Cycle music volume.

<, >: Cycle colors.

`, Backtick: Credits.

Credits

Developed by: John Schar

Art assets: www.kenney.nl

Music: Vista Sounds - Gallant, Vista-Sounds13
